2.title: Calling Peter Jackson
2.plot: In this episode Logan reaches out to New Zealand's most famous filmmaker for a break in the movie business. Will this finally be Logans big break into movie stardom?

-1.title: The Big Audition
-1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: Jam-packed with in jokes and references, each five minute episode shows Logan stumble his way through auditions and casting calls all the while believing his big break is just around the corner. Logan's gorgeous 'friend' Sophie is ever-encouraging while crass flatmate Colin seems to take delight in his failures but both remain loyal through the good times and bad. Living in Wellington, Logan knows he is only one degree seperated from Hollywood powerhouses like Peter Jackson and James Cameron. Will his dreams of movie stardom and critical acclaim become a reality?
imdb.title: The Next Big Nothing
plot: _The Next Big Nothing_ (qv) is a satirical online comedy series which follows the exploits of taxi-driver Logan Johnson as he attempts to become New Zealand's next big movie star.::Andy Burt

Jam-packed with in jokes and references, each five minute episode shows Logan stumble his way through auditions and casting calls all the while believing his big break is just around the corner. Logan's gorgeous 'friend' Sophie is ever-encouraging while crass flatmate Colin seems to take delight in his failures but both remain loyal through the good times and bad. Living in Wellington, Logan knows he is only one degree seperated from Hollywood powerhouses like Peter Jackson and James Cameron. Will his dreams of movie stardom and critical acclaim become a reality?::Andy Burt
